content.rendered:
Winter will be here before you know it, so make sure you’re ready with ice melter from Mr. Janitorial Supplies.  With different formulations to suit your needs, we can help you avoid a slip and fall disaster.

 

 

Effective to -22°C, Avalanche is our top seller!  Safe to handlewithout protective clothing, it is blue coloured for consistent visual application, and is environmentally formulated to preserve vegetation and plant life.  Available in 50lb bags, special pricing for skid lot purchases.
